title.bibl: Dziennik Chicagoski, Sept. 22, 1897. Saint Casimir Young Men's Society Helps Victims of Latimer Massacre

div.bibl: Dziennik Chicagoski, Sept. 22, 1897. SAINT CASIMIR YOUNG MEN'S SOCIETY HELPS VICTIMS OF LATIMER MASSACRE

body.p: The Saint Casimir Young Men's Society of Saint Stanislaus Kostka Parish has donated $25 for the victims of the Latimer, Pennsylvania, massacre. It is anticipated that other Polish societies will follow suit. [The massacre refers to a riot in Latimer, Pennsylvania, in which a number of miners were killed.]
